db.juhaku.juhakudb.repository.android

Class SimpleAndroidRepository<K,T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • db.juhaku.juhakudb.repository.android.SimpleAndroidRepository<K,T>
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    SimpleRepository<K,T>
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    Repository.NoRepository

    public abstract class SimpleAndroidRepository<K,T>
extends java.lang.Object
implements SimpleRepository<K,T>
    Created by juha on 15/03/17.

    General super repository class for all repositories. This repository provides implementation for methods described in SimpleRepository.

    This repository can be extended if custom repository is what is needed to implement. Normally it will be automatically implemented for you so all you need to do is to provide interface for your repository. See SimpleRepository for additional info.

    Since:
    1.1.3
    See Also:
    SimpleRepository

    • Method Detail

      • store

        public T store(T object)
        Description copied from interface: SimpleRepository
        Stores given entity and returns it with populated database id if successful and entity is new. Given entity must be annotated with Entity annotation.

        Method will save a new one or update existing one if id is set. Store operation is cascading.

        Specified by:
        store in interface SimpleRepository<K,T>
        Parameters:
        object - Object that must be database entity.
        Returns:
        Stored instance of given object.

      • storeAll

        public java.util.List<T> storeAll(java.util.Collection<T> objects)
        Description copied from interface: SimpleRepository
        Stores collection of given entities and returns them as a list with populated database id if entities are new. Entities provided must have Entity annotation.

        Method will save a new one or update existing one if id is set. Store operation is cascading.

        Specified by:
        storeAll in interface SimpleRepository<K,T>
        Returns:
        List of stored instances of given entities.

      • remove

        public int remove(K id)
        Description copied from interface: SimpleRepository
        Removes entity with given id from database completely. Remove operation is performed for entity that the current repository is managing. Remove operation is cascading.
        Specified by:
        remove in interface SimpleRepository<K,T>
        Parameters:
        id - Id of the entity to remove.
        Returns:
        Int value of number of affected rows in total.

      • removeAll

        public int removeAll(java.util.Collection<K> ids)
        Description copied from interface: SimpleRepository
        Removes entities with given ids from database completely. Remove operation is performed for entity that the current repository is managing. Remove operation is cascading.
        Specified by:
        removeAll in interface SimpleRepository<K,T>
        Parameters:
        ids - Collection of ids of the entities to remove.
        Returns:
        Int value of number of affected rows in total.

      • findOne

        public T findOne(K id)
        Description copied from interface: SimpleRepository
        Find one entity with given id from database. Query is performed for entity that the repository is managing. If entity is not found null will be returned. No joins to other tables is performed explicitly. But if user has defined some relations to EAGER then they will be fetched.
        Specified by:
        findOne in interface SimpleRepository<K,T>
        Parameters:
        id - Id of the entity to look for.
        Returns:
        Instance of found entity with the given id or null if not found.

      • findOne

        public T findOne(Filter<T> filter)
        Description copied from interface: SimpleRepository
        Find one entity with given filter. Filter can be a single instance of Filter or list of filters can be provided as Filters. In any case expected result is one entity.
        Specified by:
        findOne in interface SimpleRepository<K,T>
        Parameters:
        filter - Instance of Filter to create query for current entity as the root entity.
        Returns:
        Instance of found entity or null if not found.

      • findAll

        public java.util.List<T> findAll()
        Description copied from interface: SimpleRepository
        Find all the entities from database. Query is performed for the current entity that the repository is managing.
        Specified by:
        findAll in interface SimpleRepository<K,T>
        Returns:
        List of all the the entities form database.

      • find

        public java.util.List<T> find(Filter<T> filter)
        Description copied from interface: SimpleRepository
        Find list of entities with given filter. Filter can be a single instance of Filter or list of filters can be provided as Filters.
        Specified by:
        find in interface SimpleRepository<K,T>
        Parameters:
        filter - Instance of Filter to create query for current entity as the root entity.
        Returns:
        List of found entities or null if not found.

      • find

        public <E> E find(Query query,
                  ResultTransformer<E> resultTransformer)
        Description copied from interface: SimpleRepository
        Perform custom query to database and return the result. Result can be transformed with ResultTransformer. Query can contain the sql and args as array. If args is provided the query should have ? marks as indicators that they should be substituted with the given arguments.

        The query could be like e.g.
        new Query("select id, name from persons where name = ?", new String[]{"john"});

        Specified by:
        find in interface SimpleRepository<K,T>
        Parameters:
        query - Instance of custom Query to perform in the database.
        resultTransformer - Instance of ResultTransformer to transform result of the query.
        Returns:
        The result that is transformed by the result transformer.
